welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fontana, Malta! This quaint and charming city is known for its picturesque streets, historical landmarks, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and indulge in all that Fontana has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

restaurants.name: Patrick's Tmun

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Malta International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Malta International Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login after a certain period of time.
